body.raw:
{
	"@id": "assetIdServiceCbm",
	"@type": "dcat:Dataset",
    "dct:type": "Service",
	"dcat:distribution": [{
			"@type": "dcat:Distribution",
			"dct:format": {
				"@id": "ServiceData"
			},
            "dcat:accessURL": "http://localhost:4001/credentials",
            "authKey": "x-credstoken",
            "authCode": "authCodeCredentials"
		}],
	"dct:title": "Service CBM",
	"dct:description": "this is a service created through the CBM endpoint",
    "dcat:keyword": ["CBM", "SERVICE"],
	"contenttype": "application/json",
    "dct:issued": "2025-10-22T13:04:33+00:00",
    "dct:modified": "2025-10-22T13:04:33+00:00",
    "dct:accessRights": "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right/PUBLIC",
    "dct:license": "https://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/",
    "@context": {
        "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
        "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
        "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
    }
}

body.raw:
{
	"@id": "assetId4Cbm",
	"@type": "dcat:Dataset",
	    "dcat:distribution": [
            {
                "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
                "dct:format": {
                    "@id": "HttpData"
                },
                "dcat:accessURL": "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users",
                "proxyPath": "true",
                "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
                    "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
                    "cbm:hasField": [
                        {
                            "@type": "cbm:Field",
                            "schema:name": "username",
                            "dct:title": "User Name",
                            "cbm:datatype": "string",
                            "dct:description": "Name of the user",
                            "cbm:sampleValue": "bret"
                        },
                        {
                            "@type": "cbm:Field",
                            "schema:name": "id",
                            "dct:title": "User Identifier",
                            "cbm:datatype": "integer",
                            "dct:description": "Id of the user",
                            "cbm:sampleValue": "1"
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ],
	"dct:title": "test template 4 name",
    "dct:description": "test description",
	"contenttype": "application/json",
    "dct:issued": "2025-10-22T13:04:33+00:00",
    "dct:modified": "2025-10-22T13:04:33+00:00",
    "cbm:hasSample": ["assetId4SampleCbm"],
    "dct:accessRights": "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right/PUBLIC",
    "dct:license": "https://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/",

		"edc": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
    }
}

{
  "@context": {
    "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/",
    "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
    "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
    "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
    "schema": "https://schema.org/"
  },
  "@id": "csv_dataset_ES521005_2015",
  "@type": "dcat:Dataset",
  "contenttype": "text/csv",
  "dcat:distribution": [
    {
      "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
      "authCode": "a8f3c1e9b2d4475fa9120cbe7e65ad90",
      "authKey": "x-auth-token",
      "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
        "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
        "cbm:hasField": [
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "ES521006",
            "dct:description": "Identificador único del área de interés (laguna).",
            "dct:title": "Identificador del área de interés",
            "schema:name": "aoi_id"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "10",
            "dct:description": "Identificador único de la celda dentro de la cuadrícula.",
            "dct:title": "Identificador de celda",
            "schema:name": "cell_id"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "dateTime",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "2015-07-06T10:50:16Z",
            "dct:description": "Fecha y hora de la imagen o dato analizado.",
            "dct:title": "Fecha y hora",
            "schema:name": "timestamp"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.12305422",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación normalizada.",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDVI",
            "schema:name": "ndvi"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0.19679184",
            "dct:description": "Índice modificado de agua.",
            "dct:title": "Índice MNDWI",
            "schema:name": "mndwi"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0.0859602",
            "dct:description": "Índice específico CEDEX para análisis ambiental.",
            "dct:title": "Índice CEDEX",
            "schema:name": "cedex"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "1.16801",
            "dct:description": "Relación entre bandas SWIR y NIR.",
            "dct:title": "Ratio SWIR/NIR",
            "schema:name": "ratio_swir_nir"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0.26639273",
            "dct:description": "Índice mejorado de agua para humedales (AWEIsh).",
            "dct:title": "Índice AWEIsh",
            "schema:name": "aweish"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.49938032",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación con banda verde.",
            "dct:title": "Índice CIGreen",
            "schema:name": "cigreen"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.0635949",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada en banda roja y NIR.",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDRE",
            "schema:name": "ndre"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.07565519",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada de la textura.",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDTI",
            "schema:name": "ndti"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.0759602",
            "dct:description": "Indicador relacionado con la salinidad del agua o suelo.",
            "dct:title": "Índice de salinidad",
            "schema:name": "salinity_index"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.06010487",
            "dct:description": "Índice de diferencia normalizada de clorofila.",
            "dct:title": "Índice NDCI",
            "schema:name": "ndci"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "0.13885115",
            "dct:description": "Índice de vegetación basado en reflectancia roja.",
            "dct:title": "Índice CI_RE",
            "schema:name": "ci_re"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "37.95690968",
            "dct:description": "Coordenada geográfica de latitud en grados decimales.",
            "dct:title": "Latitud",
            "schema:name": "latitude"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "float",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "-0.76692115",
            "dct:description": "Coordenada geográfica de longitud en grados decimales.",
            "dct:title": "Longitud",
            "schema:name": "longitude"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "integer",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "4326",
            "dct:description": "Código EPSG del sistema de referencia espacial.",
            "dct:title": "EPSG",
            "schema:name": "epsg"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "Parque Natural del Hondo",
            "dct:description": "Nombre común del área de interés (laguna).",
            "dct:title": "Nombre del área de interés",
            "schema:name": "aoi_name"
          },
          {
            "@type": "cbm:Field",
            "cbm:datatype": "string",
            "cbm:sampleValue": "S2A_MSIL2A_20150706T105016_N0500_R051_T30SXH_20231010T143709",
            "dct:description": "Nombre de la imagen de la que provienen los datos.",
            "dct:title": "Carpeta de origen",
            "schema:name": "folder"
          }
        ]
      },
      "dcat:accessURL": "https://idearium.eu/heleade/download.php?file=es521005_aoi_2015.csv",
      "dcat:byteSize": 2761618,
      "dct:format": {
        "@id": "HttpData"
      },
      "proxyPath": "true"
    }
  ],
  "dcat:keyword": [
    "WETLANDS",
    "HONDO",
    "GRID",
    "CEDEX",
    "NDWI",
    "MNDWI"
  ],
  "dcat:spatialResolutionInMeters": 500.0,
  "dcat:temporalResolution": "P1D",
  "dct:accessRights": "http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/access-right/RESTRICTED",
  "dct:accrualPeriodicity": "annual",
  "dct:description": "Archivo con datos agregados anuales de varios índices espectrales (NDVI, NDWI, MNDWI, etc.) calculados para cada celda de la cuadrícula del Parque Natural del Hondo. Incluye un registro por celda y año con los valores resultantes del análisis.",
  "dct:issued": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:license": "https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/",
  "dct:modified": "2025-12-31T00:00:00+01:00",
  "dct:rights": "Datos derivados de imágenes Sentinel-2 del programa Copernicus.",
  "dct:spatial": "POLYGON ((-0.808594 38.215505, -0.686988 38.215505, -0.686988 38.154669, -0.808594 38.154669, -0.808594 38.215505))",
  "dct:temporal": {
    "dcat:endDate": "2015-12-31T23:59:59+01:00",
    "dcat:startDate": "2015-01-01T00:00:00+01:00"
  },
  "dct:title": "Datos de análisis anual de índices para la cuadrícula del Parque Natural del Hondo (2015)",
  "dct:type": "Dataset"
}
